bot.new.max_steps: The steps around your initial location
bot.new.location_cache: Bot will start at last known location
bot.new.distance_unit: Set the unit to display distance
bot.new.initial_tranfer: Min CP to transfer your Pokémon at the beginning of the run
bot.new.evolve_speed: Speed between each evolves in seconds
bot.new.item_filter: Pass a list of unwanted items items to recycle when collected at a Pokestop
